snippet.title: Yet, I despise  him Trailer
snippet.description:
A trailer for my new and upcoming game " Yet, I despise him"

Link to game´s page : http://gamejolt.com/games/platformer/yet-i-despise-him/34425/


Game description:
"You play as Richard, who sets out on a quest to find his father who has been searching for the secret of life, deep within the uncharted wilderness. On your journey you must come to terms with your deep resentment for your father, something that has developed under the years of abandonment during his research.

 

Jump from wall to wall, shoot yourself through the vicious wildlife, and discover the long harbored secrets of this primal world.
"

Be sure to be on the lookout as the game is soon to be released!
